channel.title: end-to-end-testing on Yury Fedorov
channel.description: Recent content in end-to-end-testing on Yury Fedorov

item.title: Code coverage in end-to-end/integration Go tests
item.description: I like writing integration tests for my Go code. They give me confidence that everything works as expected. This was one of the reasons I built Gnomock (an integration and end-to-end toolkit based on Docker): to easily write tests for code that uses databases or other external services, like AWS S3 or Splunk.
